Description

Tracks 1, 25-30 are re-arrange versions

Tracks 2-22 are PC-88 original versions

Tracks 23, 24 are PC-Engine original versions

Composed & Arrangement:

Shinobu Ogawa: 1, 4, 6, 8, 9, 10, 12, 14, 15, 17, 20, 25, 26, 28

Tenpei Sato: 2, 3, 5, 7, 11, 16, 18, 21, 22, 27, 29, 30

Masahiro Kajiwara: 13, 19

Jizou Club: 23, 24

Performance: YOU ON A GIN, Jizou Club (23, 24 only)
